attributes.action: Hold A Deal Or No Deal Referendum On The Government's Brexit Deal With The EU
attributes.additional_details:
Reaction as Brexit vote defeated, BBC, 28th March 2019: https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/live/uk-politics-parliaments-47696409

Brexit votes: MPs fail to back proposals again, BBC, 2nd April 2019:
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-47781009

Brexit: Theresa May defends 31 October delay to MPs, BBC, 11th April 2019:
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-47897784
attributes.background: Parliament has demonstrated that it is opposed to any proposed version of resolving Brexit. The UK voted to leave the EU in 2016 and a referendum with the only options being the government's deal or no deal would let the people decide which of the only two credible methods of leaving they prefer.
